languages.text: "Грубо, Вольный Торговец. Очень грубо и неубедительно вы строите из себя легкомысленн{mf|ого|ую} дур{mf|ачка|очку}. Так вы не обманете и самого завалящего арбитра в Империуме. Старайтесь лучше".
"Crude, Rogue Trader. A crude and unconvincing attempt at playing the careless simpleton. It wouldn't have fooled even the least competent member of the Adeptus Arbites in the Imperium. Try harder."
languages.original_text: "Грубо, Вольный Торговец. Очень грубо и неубедительно вы строите из себя легкомысленн{mf|ого|ую} дур{mf|ачка|очку}. Так вы не обманете и самого завалящего арбитра в Империуме. Старайтесь лучше".

languages.text: 「適当が過ぎるな、自由開拓者。不注意な能なしごっこをするには荒削りで説得力に欠けている。帝国の高等裁定局のメンバー相手には、たとえどんな無能であってもごまかしは通用しない。せいぜいがんばるんだな」
languages.original_text: "Crude, Rogue Trader. A crude and unconvincing attempt at playing the careless simpleton. It wouldn't have fooled even the least competent member of the Adeptus Arbites in the Imperium. Try harder."

traits.locale_text: 「適当が過ぎるな、自由開拓者。不注意な能なしごっこをするには荒削りで説得力に欠けている。帝国の高等裁定局のメンバー相手には、たとえどんな無能であってもごまかしは通用しない。せいぜいがんばるんだな」

languages.original_text: "Crude, Rogue Trader. A crude and unconvincing attempt at playing the careless simpleton. It wouldn't have fooled even the least competent member of the Adeptus Arbites in the Imperium. Try harder."

languages.text: “太拙劣了，行商浪人。你试图扮演一无所知的傻瓜，可你的演技太差了，就连帝国法务部最无能的官僚都骗不过去。你得再加把劲。”
languages.original_text: "Crude, Rogue Trader. A crude and unconvincing attempt at playing the careless simpleton. It wouldn't have fooled even the least competent member of the Adeptus Arbites in the Imperium. Try harder."

traits.locale_text: “太拙劣了，行商浪人。你试图扮演一无所知的傻瓜，可你的演技太差了，就连帝国法务部最无能的官僚都骗不过去。你得再加把劲。”

languages.text: «Muy burdo, Comerciante Independiente. Un intento rudimentario y nada convincente de parecer una persona simplona y descuidada. No convencería ni al más incompetente del Adeptus Arbites en todo el Imperium. Tendrá que esforzarse más».
languages.original_text: "Crude, Rogue Trader. A crude and unconvincing attempt at playing the careless simpleton. It wouldn't have fooled even the least competent member of the Adeptus Arbites in the Imperium. Try harder."

traits.locale_text: «Muy burdo, Comerciante Independiente. Un intento rudimentario y nada convincente de parecer una persona simplona y descuidada. No convencería ni al más incompetente del Adeptus Arbites en todo el Imperium. Tendrá que esforzarse más».

languages.text: « Allons, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Voulez-vous vraiment jouer la carte {mf|du|de la} simple d'esprit ? C'est grossier et à la limite de l'insultant. Même les membres les moins compétents de l'Adeptus Arbites ne seraient pas tombés dans le panneau. Vous allez devoir faire mieux que ça. »
languages.original_text: "Crude, Rogue Trader. A crude and unconvincing attempt at playing the careless simpleton. It wouldn't have fooled even the least competent member of the Adeptus Arbites in the Imperium. Try harder."

traits.locale_text: « Allons, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Voulez-vous vraiment jouer la carte {mf|du|de la} simple d'esprit ? C'est grossier et à la limite de l'insultant. Même les membres les moins compétents de l'Adeptus Arbites ne seraient pas tombés dans le panneau. Vous allez devoir faire mieux que ça. »

languages.text: "Plump, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ein plumper und wenig überzeugender Versuch, den ahnungslosen Einfaltspinsel zu spielen. Damit täuscht Ihr nicht einmal das unfähigste Mitglied des Adeptus Arbites im Imperium. Strengt Euch mehr an."
languages.original_text: "Crude, Rogue Trader. A crude and unconvincing attempt at playing the careless simpleton. It wouldn't have fooled even the least competent member of the Adeptus Arbites in the Imperium. Try harder."

languages.text: "Yavan bir açıklama Hür Tacir. Savsak, basit biri izlenimi uyandırma çabasındaki, yavan ve ikna edicilikten uzak bir deneme. Bu şekilde Adeptus Arbites'in en az ehil mensubunu bile kandıramazsın. Daha çok çalışmalısın."
languages.original_text: "Crude, Rogue Trader. A crude and unconvincing attempt at playing the careless simpleton. It wouldn't have fooled even the least competent member of the Adeptus Arbites in the Imperium. Try harder."

traits.locale_text: "Yavan bir açıklama Hür Tacir. Savsak, basit biri izlenimi uyandırma çabasındaki, yavan ve ikna edicilikten uzak bir deneme. Adeptus Arbites'in en az ehil üyesini bile kandıramazdın. Daha çok çalışmalısın."
